trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: The knight conqueror's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can cast the following spells:

trait.name: Mark of the Conquered
entries: As a bonus action, the knight conqueror extends its finger towards a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target is marked until the start of the knight conqueror's next turn. While the target is marked, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than the knight conqueror.

trait.name: Righteous Might
entries: The knight conqueror scores a critical hit on a roll of 18, 19, or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight conqueror makes two attacks with its flail.

action.name: Conqueror's Flail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Conquering Presence (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the knight conqueror's choice that can see it within 30 feet of it must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes frightened of the knight conqueror for 1 minute. The target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
